name: Ash
description: Ash is a fast and versatile Attacker, equipped with a powerful grenade launcher that can breach almost any surface.

otherOperator.bio: Ash hails from Israel and serves as a demolitions expert for Team Rainbow.

name: Doc
description: Doc is a formidable Defender, capable of reviving teammates from a distance with his Stim Pistol.

otherOperator.bio: Doc, whose real name is Gustave Kateb, hails from France and previously worked as a medic in the French Army.

name: Pulse
description: Pulse is a keen-eyed Defender, equipped with a cardiac sensor that can detect heartbeats through walls.

otherOperator.bio: Pulse, also known as Jack Estrada, is a former SWAT officer from the United States.

name: Tachanka
description: Tachanka is a stalwart Defender, wielding a mounted RP-46 Degtyaryov machine gun.

otherOperator.bio: Tachanka, whose real name is Alexsandr Senaviev, is a former Spetsnaz operative from Russia.

name: Twitch
description: Twitch is a resourceful Attacker, utilizing a shock drone to disable enemy gadgets from a distance.

otherOperator.bio: Twitch, whose real name is Emmanuelle Pichon, is a former GIGN operator from France.

name: Thermite
description: Thermite is an essential Attacker, equipped with exothermic charges capable of breaching reinforced walls.

otherOperator.bio: Thermite, also known as Jordan Trace, is a former FBI SWAT officer from the United States.
